meanings.definition: The state of being foolish or lacking in intelligence.
meanings.sent1: His softheadednesses often led him to make poor choices.
meanings.sent2: Her softheadednesses made her an easy target for scams.
meanings.sent3: Despite his softheadednesses, he always managed to find humor in every situation.
meanings.sent4: The team's softheadednesses in strategy cost them the game.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of her softheadednesses were evident in her failing grades.

meanings.definition: The quality of being easily influenced or swayed by emotions.
meanings.sent1: Her softheadednesses made her cry at the slightest provocation.
meanings.sent2: His softheadednesses caused him to agree with whatever others said.
meanings.sent3: The movie's emotional scenes always triggered her softheadednesses.
meanings.sent4: In the heat of the argument, his softheadednesses clouded his judgment.
meanings.sent5: She couldn't control her softheadednesses when watching romantic movies.

meanings.definition: A tendency to make irrational or illogical decisions.
meanings.sent1: His softheadednesses often led him to regrettable choices.
meanings.sent2: The company suffered due to the CEO's softheadednesses in financial matters.
meanings.sent3: Despite his softheadednesses, he somehow managed to stumble upon success.
meanings.sent4: The politician's softheadednesses cost him the trust of his constituents.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of her softheadednesses were evident in her repeated failures.
